GLTimeUtil.hh

00001 //
00002 // File:    GLTimeUtil.hh
00003 // Purpose:
00004 //    Decodes time stamp in input arguments, from YYYY:MM:DD:HH:mm:ss
00005 //    into LCCDTimeStamp format.
00006 //
00007 // 070806 - G.Lima - extracted from cddata/dbfill/sipmmapfromdb.cc
00008 //
00009 #include "lccd.h"
00010 #include <iostream>
00011 #include <string>
00012 #include <cstdlib>
00013 
00014 // -- To get the current time
00015 #define SECTONS 1000000000LL
00016 #define MUSECTONS 1000LL
00017 #include <ctime>
00018 //to set the desired time
00019 #define TIMEVECSIZE 6
00020 #define YEAR 0
00021 #define MONTH 1
00022 #define DAY 2
00023 #define HOUR 3
00024 #define MINUTE 4
00025 #define SECONDS 5
00026 
00027 lccd::LCCDTimeStamp interpretTimeStamp(char* arg) {
00028   //The usertime
00029   std::string usertimeStr(arg);
00030   std::vector<int> usertimevec;
00031   std::string usertime_stream;
00032   for (unsigned i = 0; i < usertimeStr.length(); ++i) {
00033     if ( usertimeStr[i] != ':' ) {
00034       if( !isdigit( usertimeStr[i] ) ) {
00035         std::cout << "Error in reading <timestamp> value " << std::endl;
00036         std::cout << "Check format of <timestamp> value " << std::endl;
00037         std::cout << "Will leave the program now " << std::endl;
00038         exit(1);
00039       }
00040       usertime_stream += usertimeStr[i];
00041     }
00042     else {
00043       usertimevec.push_back( atoi ( usertime_stream.c_str() ) );
00044       usertime_stream = " ";
00045     }
00046 
00047     if (i == usertimeStr.length()-1) {
00048       usertimevec.push_back( atoi ( usertime_stream.c_str() ) );
00049     }
00050   }
00051 
00052   if ( usertimevec.size() < TIMEVECSIZE ) {
00053     std::cout << "Error in reading <timestamp> value " << std::endl;
00054     std::cout << "Don't have the desired six time parameters" << std::endl;
00055     std::cout << "Will leave the program now " << std::endl;
00056     exit(1);
00057   }
00058 
00059 //   std::cout <<"usertime="<< usertimevec.at(YEAR) <<":"<< usertimevec.at(MONTH) <<":"<< usertimevec.at(DAY) <<":"<< usertimevec.at(HOUR) <<":"<< usertimevec.at(MINUTE) <<":"<< usertimevec.at(SECONDS) << std::endl;
00060   LCTime usertime( usertimevec.at(YEAR),
00061                    usertimevec.at(MONTH),
00062                    usertimevec.at(DAY),
00063                    usertimevec.at(HOUR),
00064                    usertimevec.at(MINUTE),
00065                    usertimevec.at(SECONDS)) ;
00066 
00067   return usertime.timeStamp();
00068 }
